definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: And some marionettes can be made to imitate almost every human and animal action.
sentences.chinese: 某些提線木偶幾乎能模仿人和動物的所有動作。

sentences.english: The puppeteer, who operates it, needs great skill.
sentences.chinese: 提線木偶對錶演者的技能要求很高。

sentences.english: You know, one of those marionette things.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，那是一個提線木偶。

sentences.english: Performances of puppet troupes from Fujian will also be staged in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 來自福建的提線木偶戲也將現場演出。

sentences.english: Perhaps the Swedish chef from the muppets is your role model instead?
sentences.chinese: 也許你提線木偶裏的瑞典廚師是你的榜樣？

sentences.english: Clare ismaking a huge sculpture out of tiny wisps of purple paper; it looks like across between a Muppet and a bird’s nest.
sentences.chinese: 那雕像看起來象一個提線木偶，又象個鳥窩。
